item.name: User Management

request.description:
Get current authenticated user's profile based on JWT token. Accessible by any authenticated user (student, tutor, admin).

**Response includes:**
- User profile information (name, email, phone, role, status)
- Excludes sensitive data (passwordHash, otp)

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "_id": "user_id",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "phone": "9876543210",
  "role": "student",
  "status": "active",
  "isPhoneVerified": true,
  "createdAt": "2025-01-10T08:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"
}
```

Update current authenticated user's profile. Users can update their name, email, phone, and password. Cannot change role or status (admin only). Accessible by any authenticated user.

**Updatable Fields:**
- `name`: User's name
- `email`: User's email (validates uniqueness)
- `phone`: User's phone number (validates uniqueness)
- `password`: User's password (automatically hashed)

**Restrictions:**
- Users cannot change their own `role` or `status`
- Email and phone must be unique if changed
- Validates that email/phone aren't already taken

**Example Request Body:**
```json
{
  "name": "John Doe Updated",
  "email": "newemail@example.com",
  "phone": "9876543210",
  "password": "newpassword123"
}
```

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Profile updated successfully",
  "user": {
    "_id": "user_id",
    "name": "John Doe Updated",
    "email": "newemail@example.com",
    "phone": "9876543210",
    "role": "student",
    "status": "active"
  }
}
```

item.name: Dashboard

query.description: Filter by specific year (optional). If not provided, returns all months.

request.description:
Get student registrations grouped by month with active/blocked breakdown. Returns monthly student growth statistics. Accessible by Admin and Tutor.

**Response includes:**
- `monthlyStudentGrowth`: Array of monthly data with year, month, monthName, count, active, blocked
- `total`: Total students across all months

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "monthlyStudentGrowth": [
    {
      "year": 2025,
      "month": 1,
      "monthName": "January",
      "count": 50,
      "active": 45,
      "blocked": 5
    }
  ],
  "total": 50
}
```

item.name: Course Management

query.description: Filter by exam type (e.g., IELTS_AC, GRE) (optional)
Filter by status: draft or published (optional)
Filter by creator ID or use 'me' for current user (optional)

request.description:
Get list of all soft-deleted courses. Only shows courses with deletedAt != null.

**Access Control:**
- Tutors can only see their own deleted courses
- Admins can see all deleted courses

**Response includes:**
- `items`: Array of deleted courses with full details including deletedAt timestamp
- `total`: Total count of deleted courses
- `page`: Current page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `totalPages`: Total number of pages

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "items": [
    {
      "_id": "course_id",
      "title": "Deleted Course Title",
      "examType": "IELTS_AC",
      "category": "Academic",
      "status": "published",
      "deletedAt": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000Z",
      "createdBy": {
        "_id": "user_id",
        "name": "Tutor Name",
        "email": "tutor@example.com"
      },
      "createdAt": "2025-01-10T08:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "total": 5,
  "page": 1,
  "limit": 20,
  "totalPages": 1
}
```
